Return a list of all fields and their a:
MATCH (f:Field)<-[:weatherAtField]-(w:WeatherObservation)
WITH f.fieldId AS fieldId, f.fieldLatitude AS latitude, f.fieldLongitude AS longitude, AVG(w.precipitation) AS avgPrecipitation
RETURN fieldId, latitude, longitude, avgPrecipitation

MATCH (f:Field)<-[:weatherAtField]-(w:WeatherObservation)
WHERE (w.precipitation) IS NOT NULL AND NOT isNaN(w.precipitation)
RETURN f.fieldId AS fieldId, ROUND(AVG(w.precipitation),2) AS averagePrecipitation
Return all experimental units and their: MATCH (u:ExperimentalUnit) RETURN u.expUnit_UID AS Experimental_unit, u.expUnitStartDate AS Experimental_unit_start_date, u.expUnitEndDate AS Experimental_unit_end_date, u.expUnitSize AS Experimental_unit_size, u.fieldSlopePercent AS Experimental_unit_field_slope_percent, u.landscapePosition AS Experimental_unit_landscape_position, u.expUnitChangeInManagement AS Experimental_unit_change_in_management
Return all field and their corresponding:
MATCH (f:Field)<-[:weatherAtField]-(w:WeatherObservation)
WITH f.fieldId AS fieldId, w.precipitation AS precipitation
RETURN fieldId, precipitation
Return all fields and their correspondin: MATCH (f:Field) RETURN f.fieldId, f.fieldLatitude, f.fieldLongitude, f.fieldElevation
